p1: 1. Make sure you have a TronLink wallet. Click to download the TronLink wallet
p2: 2. To participate in the game you must own TRX, the underlying cryptocurrency that powers the TRON network.
p3: 3. Set your bet amount, that is, the number of TRX you want to bet on.
p4: 4. You can adjust the slider to the predicted number range you want. When moving the slider, you can win the total amount, win rate, reward multiple will be automatically adjusted.
p5: 5. Click the scroll button to start the game. The smart contract will then randomly generate a lucky number from 1 to 100.
p6: 6. If the lucky number is within your range, you win!
p7: Still questions? Welcome to join our telegram group, we are glad to help you!
tipLogin:
Please login to your TRON wallet. If you do not have TRON wallet installed please visit https://goo.gl/Yb4NRU and download the chrome extension.
(TRONdice is only availble using Chrome browser for the time being)

PrizeRule.title: Rewards Rules
PrizeRule.header: To thank our supporters, trondice.org has released a new feature of Weekly Betting Ranking List, with various amount of TRX reward for the top 1 - 50 players on the list.
PrizeRule.footer: Rewards will be sent to your address within 3 days upon the release of the weekly list.
PrizeRule.copyright: * Trondice.org reserves the final right to interpret the terms and conditions of this content.

marquee.p1: The site https://trondice.org/ is going to have a system upgrade, which is intended to enhance the anti-cheating mechanism of the site. During the upgrade, the 【Roll the dice】button and the 【Withdraw】button will be disabled. After the upgrade is completed, all the features will be back to use.
marquee.p2: We strongly suggest that you withdraw all your prize into your wallet before the upgrade.

LuckyDraw.title: Lucky draw
LuckyDraw.introductions: Press the "lucky draw" button to draw a number; claim your prize of the number.

supplement.p1: The first betting of a day will give you 1 opportunity to draw!
supplement.p2: You will win an extra opportunity to draw for free for each betting over 10 TRX!
supplement.p3: A maximum of 10 opportunities (accumulated) to draw!

LuckyDraw.explanation: TRONDICE.ORG reserves the right of final interpretation of the campaign

vip.title: VIP privileges
vip.desc: Exclusive VIP benefits with special rewards for each betting!
vip.remainingBet: A betting of {trx} TRX will make you VIP{level}
vip.copyRight: * TRONDICE.ORG reserves the right of final interpretation of the campaign

invite.title: Refer a friend
invite.desc: Refer a friend and get 0.2% of their betting! Copy your exclusive link and send out your invitation!

prizeRule.p1: The referral bonus for each account will be calculated once at 12:00 (GMT+8) every day.
prizeRule.p2: The bonus will be deposited into the corresponding account with a record of the invitation.

LoginTipTitle: Please log in to your TRON Chrome Wallet.
LoginTipContent: If you have not downloaded the wallet, please visit https://goo.gl/Yb4NRU and download the Chrome extensions.
